column2: which was seven|Folded in this triple melody, the audience sat gazing
column3: and beheld gently and approvingly without interrogation, for it seemed inevitable, a box tree in a green tub take the place of the ladiesâ€™ dressing-room
column4: while on what seemed to be a wall, was hung a great clock face
column5: the hands pointing to three minutes to the hour
